name: Tater Spud
description:
Explore, fight, and platform through deadly plants and obstacles as a potato named Tater Spud. Interact with friendly flora and fauna to begin to learn what is causing the world to turn rotten.

Play as Tater Spud to gain powerful abilities and use collectables to upgrade your gear with the goal of defeating some of the nastiest plant-animals ever seen. Whether day or night there will be dangers to overcome (or die a lot from).

Features
  • Hidden Powerups
  • Collectable Tater Tots and Mushrooms
  • Upgradeable Weapons
  • Tough Bosses
  • Talking Plants & Animals (woah)
  • Free Updates

Tater Spud (left) and Murphy Mango (right)
